name: The Gatherer
description:
Adds The Gatherer as a new playable character.

v0.3.0
- Now 70 cards and 6 relics.
- Changed cards' name to fit the theme of character.
- Spare Bottle was removed from the starting deck, and is now Event-only.
- Added 5 new cards.
- Some cards have a <Tag> next to their name, which indicates they are different versions of same card.
